en: Being careful about his health, he seldom gets sick.
zh: 因为他很在意身体，所以难得病上一回。

en: He almost never gets sick because he is careful about his health.
zh: 他几乎从不生病，因为他非常注意身体。

en: You must take good care of yourself.
zh: 你一定要照顾好自己。

en: You cannot be too careful about your health.
zh: 对待健康，再怎么细心都不过分。

en: It is impossible for you to be too careful of your health.
zh: 对自己的身体，你再怎么在意都不嫌多。

en: A healthy man does not know the value of health.
zh: 身体健康的人不知道健康的可贵。

en: Given health, one can do anything.
zh: 只要身体好，什么都能干。

en: Health and gaiety foster beauty.
zh: 健康和快乐能让人变得更美。

en: Without health, we can not hope for success.
zh: 没有健康，就别想成功。

en: Without health we cannot hope for success.
zh: 没有健康的身体，成功也就无从谈起。

en: You can apply for a physical fitness test regardless of your age.
zh: 不管你多大岁数，都可以申请体能测试。

en: Working, healthy people contribute to the reduction of medical expenses, the rise of the eligible age for benefits, and the curtailment of their costs.
zh: 身体健康的劳动者有助于减少医疗开支，推迟领取福利的年龄，并降低成本。

en: You ought to keep working while you have your health.

en: You should take care so that you can have good health.
zh: 你得好好保重，才能有个好身体。

en: It goes without saying that good health is more important than wealth.
zh: 毫无疑问，健康比财富更重要。

en: It is needless to say health is above wealth.
zh: 不用说，健康肯定比财富更重要。

en: Good health is his capital.

en: It goes without saying that health is important.
zh: 健康很重要，这是明摆着的。

en: My health is my only capital.
zh: 身体是我唯一的本钱。

en: Health means everything to me.
zh: 对我来说，健康就是一切。

en: It goes without saying that health is most important.
zh: 不用说，健康才是最要紧的。

en: Health is the most precious thing.
zh: 健康是最宝贵的东西。

en: Health is the first condition of happiness.
zh: 健康是幸福的首要条件。

en: Health is the most important thing.
zh: 健康才是最重要的。

en: He retired on account of poor health.

en: His bad health is a great disadvantage to him.
zh: 他身体不好，这对他挺不利的。

en: Poor health prohibited him from traveling.
zh: 身体不好让他没法去旅游。

en: Thank you for your e-mail regarding the matter in question.

en: The monthly staff meeting is never held on Monday.

en: Flights to the moon were once thought absurd.

en: Any day will do except Monday.

zh: 因为一个月写几行就够了，只要写写博客，你的英语水平就能提高。

en: They are as different as day and night.

en: The moon is shining brightly.

en: The moon has set.

en: The moon is shining bright.

en: I had blood in my urine.

en: I have bloody stools.

en: The blood test is normal.

en: Blood circulates through the body.

en: Blood stains don't usually disappear.
zh: 血迹通常很难洗掉。

en: What's the reading on the blood pressure monitor?

en: Let me take your blood pressure.
zh: 我给你量个血压吧。

en: My blood pressure is 155 over 105.
Blood pressure is important as a barometer of health.
zh: 血压是衡量健康的重要指标。

en: I feel sick whenever I see blood.

en: The sight of blood made her excited.

en: He was surprised at the sight of blood.

en: Blood will tell.

en: The blood was bright red.

en: Blood runs in the veins.

en: The blood was a dark color.

en: I passed clots.

en: Blood will have blood.

en: Wash blood with blood.

en: My phlegm has blood in it.

en: Blood is flowing from the wound at the back of her head.
zh: 她后脑勺的伤口一直在流血。

en: Blood ran from his wound.

en: Let's forget everything about that conclusion.
zh: 咱们把关于那个结论的所有事都忘了吧。

en: It's up to you to make the decision.

en: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
zh: 婚前睁大眼，婚后睁一只眼闭一只眼。

en: Marriage, in peace, is this world's paradise; in strife, this life's purgatory.
zh: 婚姻和睦是天堂，争吵不休是炼狱。

en: In marriage there should be equal give and take.

en: Patterns of married life are changing a lot.

en: The wedding will take place next spring.
zh: 婚礼定在明年春天举行。

en: The wedding will take place on Saturday.
zh: 婚礼将在周六举行。

en: The wedding will take place at the end of October.

en: The wedding was put off.

en: The wedding ceremony was performed in the morning.

zh: 别担心婚礼致辞的事，到时候临场发挥就行。

zh: 关于婚礼……这可是这一辈子唯一一次当主角的机会，与其抠抠搜搜地办，不如大干一场，办得体体面面的。

en: Set some money apart for marrying.

en: More and more women continue to work after marriage.

en: The salaryman proposed to the director's daughter, but he was rejected.
zh: 那个上班族向主管的女儿求婚，结果被拒绝了。

en: Marriages are made in heaven and consummated on earth.

en: Marriage is the union of a man and woman.

en: Marriage is a serious matter.

en: Marriage can be a wonderful thing if two people understand each other.
zh: 只要两个人能互相理解，婚姻可以是非常美好的。

en: Many ethnic groups traditionally give money as a wedding gift.
zh: 很多民族的传统都是送礼金当结婚礼物。

en: Marriage proposals flooded in.
zh: 求婚的人络绎不绝。

en: Marriage customs differ by country.
zh: 每个国家的婚俗都不一样。

en: He changed his mind in consequence of the marriage.
zh: 因为结了婚，他改变了主意。

en: The critical period in matrimony is breakfast time.
zh: 婚姻中最关键的时刻是吃早饭的时候。

en: Please accept this gift for the celebration on your wedding.
zh: 这是给你新婚的一点小意思，请收下。

en: Marriage has many pains, but celibacy has no pleasures.
zh: 婚姻虽然有很多烦恼，但单身也没什么乐趣。

en: In marriage, settling down benefits men more than women.
zh: 在婚姻里，成家立业对男人的好处比女人多。

en: He's very rigid in his ideas on marriage.
zh: 他对婚姻的看法非常死板。

en: Oh that I had never married.
zh: 唉，我要是没结婚就好了。

en: I should have never married.
zh: 我当初真不该结婚。

en: I wish I hadn't gotten married.
zh: 我真希望自己没结过婚。

en: The institution of marriage appears to be on the decline.
zh: 婚姻制度似乎正在走下坡路。

en: She was a Wakahata before she married.
zh: 她出嫁前姓若旗。

en: She was a Bennett before she married.
zh: 她出嫁前姓班内特。

en: Getting married is a serious matter.
zh: 结婚是件严肃的大事。

en: Marriage is the last thing on my mind.
zh: 我压根就没想过要结婚。

en: I didn't know if I was coming or going the week before I got married.
zh: 结婚前那一周，我忙得都分不清东南西北了。

en: I want to marry you.
zh: 我想跟你结婚。

en: Let's get married.
zh: 我们结婚吧。

en: Better be still single than ill married.
zh: 与其结个烂婚，不如一直单着。

en: We've been married for five years.
zh: 我们结婚五年了。

en: They split up after a year of marriage.
zh: 他们结婚才一年就分了。

en: Since we got married, he's become a devoted family man.
zh: 自从结婚后，他成了一个顾家的好男人。

en: You never told me that you were married.
zh: 你从没跟我说过你已经结婚了。

en: Asked to marry him, I was at a loss for words.
zh: 被他求婚时，我激动得说不出话来。

en: Among married couples, there has been an increase in divorce and separation with the result that there are many more one-parent families.
zh: 现在的夫妻里，离婚和分居的越来越多，导致单亲家庭也变多了。

en: Married people sometimes wish they were single.
zh: 结了婚的人有时也会想恢复单身。

en: I had a baby girl the year after I got married.
zh: 我结婚后的第二年生了个女儿。

en: How many children do you want to have when you get married?
zh: 你打算结婚后要几个孩子？

en: We just got married, and this is our honeymoon.
zh: 我们刚结婚，现在正在度蜜月。

en: A married couple should form a union.
zh: 夫妻应该心往一处想，劲往一处使。

en: I hear tell you're going to get married.
zh: 我听说你要结婚了。

en: Let me congratulate you on your marriage.
zh: 恭喜你新婚大喜。

en: It's so exciting.
zh: 太让人兴奋了。

en: OK. Go ahead.
zh: 行，你继续吧。

en: All right. I'll take it.
zh: 好的，我要了。

en: Friendship is as precious as anything else.
zh: 友谊跟任何东西一样，都是最珍贵的。

en: Everything will turn out for the best.
zh: 一切都会好起来的。

en: Everything turned out all right in the end.
zh: 最后一切都挺顺利的。

en: She is a child after all.
zh: 她毕竟还是个孩子。

en: In the end, they made up their minds to go by plane.
zh: 最后，他们决定坐飞机去。

en: After all they came to terms with each other.
zh: 最终他们还是达成了一致。

en: In the end, he wasn't able to succeed.
zh: 他最后还是没能成功。

en: He lost his happiness in the end.
zh: 到头来，他还是丢掉了幸福。

en: He did not buy it after all.
zh: 他最后还是没买。

en: His plan went well after all.
zh: 他的计划最后还是进行得很顺利。

en: No one could solve the problem after all.
zh: 结果还是没人能解决这个问题。

en: The baby turned out to be a girl after all.
zh: 结果这孩子还是个女孩。

en: After all, it's sure to fail.
zh: 反正最后肯定会失败。

en: I have lost the case after all.
zh: 这场官司我最后还是打输了。

en: Does this mean you're not coming to help?
zh: 这么说，你是不打算过来帮忙了？

en: In the end we reached a compromise.
zh: 最后我们还是妥协了。

en: In the end our team lost the final game.
zh: 最后我们队还是输掉了决赛。

en: I am sure everything will turn out all right in the end.
zh: 我相信最后一切都会好起来的。

en: He will ultimately pass the exam.
zh: 他最后肯定能通过考试。

en: It'll add to the same thing.
zh: 反正结果都一样。

en: After all, you have to look after number one.
zh: 毕竟，你得先顾好你自己。

en: My plan was eventually adopted.
zh: 我的计划最终还是被采纳了。

en: You were right after all.
zh: 最后证明还是你说得对。

en: If you try for too much, you'll end up with nothing at all.
zh: 如果你太贪心，最后可能什么都得不到。

en: In the end, it's cheaper to join a tour.
zh: 最后还是报团更便宜。

en: She will fail eventually.
zh: 她早晚会失败的。

en: After all, nothing remains forever.
zh: 毕竟没有什么能永远存在。

en: After all, it is talent that counts in music.
zh: 搞音乐，说到底还是看天赋。

en: In the long run, prices will rise.
zh: 长远来看，物价还是会上涨。

en: After all, life is just like a dream.
zh: 人生到头来就像一场梦。

en: When all is said and done, the most precious element in life is wonder.
zh: 说到底，生命中最珍贵的就是对世界的好奇心。

en: After all, different people have different ways of eating, according to the kinds of food which they have traditionally eaten.
zh: 毕竟大家的饮食习惯不同，这主要取决于各自的传统。

en: In the long run, you will have to practise more.
zh: 长远来看，你还是得多多练习。

en: Nothing happened after all.
zh: 结果啥也没发生。

en: The day turned out fine after all.
zh: 最后天气还是变好了。

en: It all turned out for the best in the end.
zh: 最后的结果反倒是最好的。

en: Suffice it to say that, after all, this won't do.
zh: 反正一句话，这样做到底还是不行的。

en: What do your words add up to?
zh: 你说了这么多到底想表达什么？

en: It'll come all right in the end.
zh: 最后一切都会好的。

en: The day turned fine after all.
zh: 天气最后还是转晴了。

en: After all, he was persuaded to run for President.
zh: 他最终还是被说服去竞选总统了。

en: His explanation proved to be right after all.
zh: 他的解释最后证明是对的。

en: In the end we decided to ask our teacher for advice.
zh: 最后我们决定去请教老师。

en: After all I couldn't make heads or tails of her story.
zh: 搞了半天，我还是没听懂她讲的故事。

en: I decided not to go to the movie after all.
zh: 我最后还是决定不去看电影了。

en: He brought it up first, but he didn't show up. What's going on?
zh: 明明是他先提议的，结果他没露面。怎么回事？

en: You were wrong after all.
zh: 结果证明还是你错了。

en: The revolution, in itself, bore no fruit after all.
zh: 这场革命本身最终并没有取得任何成果。

en: After all, Stella was the only person who had the ham.
zh: 到头来，只有斯特拉一个人有火腿。

en: It turned out there was nobody who would be the first to talk about it. What do we do now?
zh: 结果谁都不愿意第一个开口。咱们现在怎么办？
